issue.message: org.jetbrains.uast.kotlin.KotlinUMethodWithFakeLightDelegate is UAST implementation. Consider using one of its corresponding UAST interfaces: `UMethod`, `UDeclaration`, `UAnnotated`, `UAnchorOwner`
